release_notes.en-US: Version 7.1.0 Fixed: Improved Support for Thunderbird 78 /* Special Thanks to Jörg Knobloch */ Update: SheetJS from v0.16.2 to v0.16.3 Version 7.0.0: New: Support for Thunderbird 78 /* Special Thanks to Jörg Knobloch */ Update: SheetJS from v0.15.2 to v0.16.2 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Variable(s) in the To field in Thunderbird 78: You must hit "Enter" or "Tab" once you have added the variable(s) in the To field. This change is caused by the new "pills" in Thunderbird 78. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Donation: Converting Mail Merge from a "Legacy Extension" to a "MailExtension Experiment" was hard work and took a lot of time. Please show your appreciation with a donation, thanks! 5 Euro | 10 Euro | 15 Euro | 20 Euro | 25 Euro 5 Dollar | 10 Dollar | 15 Dollar | 20 Dollar | 25 Dollar
